LanguageData.WandererJoin_MinchoWitch.label: wanderer minchowitch
LanguageData.WandererJoin_MinchoWitch.letterText: The Minchowitch came to this colony with an ominous chill. She's probably came here because of something related Mincho, but no one knows exactly what she's trying to do...

LanguageData.WandererJoin_MinchoWitch_Scenario.letter: The Minchowitch came to this colony with an ominous chill. She's probably came here because of something related Mincho, but no one knows exactly what she's trying to do...
